title: New Digital Services Available
content: We're excited to announce that our new digital platform is now live! You can now request documents, submit concerns, and access community services online.
author: Barangay Admin

title: Community Meeting - December 25
content: Join us for our monthly community meeting on December 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM at the Barangay Hall. We'll discuss upcoming projects and community concerns.
author: Barangay Captain

title: Holiday Schedule Notice
content: Please note that barangay offices will have modified hours during the holiday season. Regular hours will resume on January 2, 2025.
author: Barangay Secretary
